mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_기관정보기본 조회 (InstMapper.getInst) */ SELECT brno ,inst_nm ,del_yn ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_INST" WHERE 1=1 AND brno = #{brno}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_기관정보기본 수정 (InstMapper.updateInst) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_INST" SET inst_nm = coalesce(#{instNm}, inst_nm) ,del_yn = coalesce(#{delYn}, del_yn) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND brno = #{brno}
